skillTree.localised_description: By which the foe slowly turns to stone, beginning with the feet, so they are all too aware of their terrible fate as it gradually unfolds.
A modicum of care is just common sense when getting it wrong can find you trapped in another, infinitely worse dimensionâ€¦

skillTree.localised_description: The Father of Darkness protects his children from sorcery through a variety of magical means, all of them twisted and obscure.
Having a thing for hats can be most useful when everyone keeps aiming at your headâ€¦
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Should the tides of battle turn against him, Dazharr will imbue himself and his armour with magical defenses.

enabled_if: Winds of magic power is 15 or greater

skillTree.localised_description: Drazharr has a special blessing from hashut, one that permits him to call upon the signature spell of the Bull God with more ease than many casters.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Burning Wrath"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Burning Wrath Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Dazharr was permitted to call in certain reinforcements from the homeland, when the need was dire.

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only

skillTree.localised_description: Wrapped in a bulwark of Hashut magic, Wulfrik shall always enjoy the blessing of Drazharr... provided he does not stray too far afield.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The Chaos Winds drain away from the afflicted spellcaster, swirling into the flaming palm of Dazharr Doomaxe.
The bullgod of the Chaos Dwarves knows how to forge a blade... and how to guide that blade into hot, warm, flesh.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud â€“ these are the things that sustain me."
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: Witnessing other friendly units rout will only affect this unit's leadership if they also have the Contempt attribute.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "This place of stone, ash, and fire is a fine fortress, and shall be made greater by my hammer. I shall yoke my cause to yours, for Hashut!"
With a Daemonsmithâ€™s incantation, a mere drop of Hashutâ€™s purest ichor is enough to reduce entire cities to cinders and ash.

effects.description: Unlocks Hero action: Blood of Hashut

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target
